entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burwash Landing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:32 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burwash Airport 10:51 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
